This method was used to evaluate the antimicrobial activities of the EO and carvacrol against Candida albicans and bacterial strains as described by the Clinical and Laboratory Standards Institute (CLSI) [ 23]. The inhibition zone diameter for each sample was measured in mm and used to calculate the antibacterial and anticandidal activity index (AI) and % of inhibition (PI) at a concentration of 1 μL/disc using the following formulas [ 24]:
